Class StorageOperationManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Manager of storage operations of ServerStorage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageOperationManager

        public StorageOperationManager(ServerStorage storage)
        Storage operation constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • addReplicationOperation

        public Pair<StorageOperation,StorageOperation> addReplicationOperation(java.util.List<FsFile> transferList,
                                                                       ServerStorage source,
                                                                       DfsPath path,
                                                                       StorageOperationCallback callback,
                                                                       boolean pending)
        Adds new replication operation when moving files from source to this manager's storage. New write operation is created on this storage and new read operation is created on source storage.
        Parameters:
        transferList - transfered files
        source - source storage
        path - path used for data transfer
        callback - operation callback (called only once from write operation)
        pending - if operation should be created in pending status
        Returns:
        pair of created operations where first is write operation to this storage and second is read operation from source storage

      • addMigrationOperation

        public Pair<StorageOperation,StorageOperation> addMigrationOperation(java.util.List<FsFile> transferList,
                                                                     ServerStorage source,
                                                                     StorageOperationCallback callback,
                                                                     boolean autoReserveSpace,
                                                                     boolean pending)
        Adds new replication operation when moving files from source to this manager's storage. New write operation is created on this storage and new read operation is created on source storage.
        Parameters:
        transferList - transfered files
        source - source storage
        callback - operation callback (called only once from write operation)
        autoReserveSpace - if space should be reserved on this storage
        pending - if operation should be created in pending status
        Returns:
        pair of created operations where first is write operation to this storage and second is read operation from source storage

        Remove operation from either running or pending list.
        Parameters:
        operation - operation to be removed
